org.zamia

Class ZamiaProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zamia.ZamiaProject

  • public class ZamiaProject
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ZamiaProject is the central point holding together all zamia classes, objects and structures related to a project. It takes care of IG and (todo) RTLGraph generation and persistence. Also anchors the central compiler invocation and DU storage facility DUManager and the build path.
    Author:
    Guenter Bartsch
